block.name: Symbol Generator
block.doc: This block simply allows us to generate a random stream of uncorrelated symbols with discretely defined probability weightings. All we do is pass a vector of doubles where the double describes the weighting of the symbol as represented by the index of said vector. Thus a weighting vector of [1,1,1,2] would produce symbol values {0,1,2,3} with respective probabilities of {0.2, 0.2, 0.2, 0.4}. This block also has the ability to add alignment tags at set intervals to aid in alignment.
